mapper.insert: insert into ho_board(hno, title, content, writer, bview) values (hno.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0)
mapper.update: update ho_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, uddate = sysdate where hno = #{hno}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ho_board
where hno > 0
mapper.update: update ho_board set bview = bview+1 where hno = #{hno}
mapper.select: select hno, title, writer, ranking from( select hno, title, writer, row_number() over (order by bview desc) as ranking from ho_board ) where ranking between 1 and 3
